hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
rapport my name is Dave and this is
episode 1427 a and today's date is
November 16th 2017 and the thought of
the episode is deja vu we are seeing the
same signs now as we saw back in 2008
let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now we are starting to
see a lot of the same exact signs that
we saw in Prior recessions where the
economy looked like it was doing very
well and the whole thing just completely
fell apart now we know the initial
jobless claims they have been falling
and falling declining declining
declining and they're trying to convince
us that hey everyone has a job no one's
applying for any type of jobless claims
everything is perfect now if we look
back in time and we go back to 2007 to
2008 we go back to 2000 to 2001 and we
go back to each and every one of the
recessions we see that there's a pattern
there's a pattern where the initial
jobless claims they've reached all-time
lows and then all of a sudden people
start to apply well we can see right now
that we are back into the nineteen
seventy area where initial jobless
claims have dropped that far now this is
because of all the manipulation that's
been going on and what we're seeing
right now is that there are people now
applying in fact there are over four
percent more people on initial jobless
claims than this year then this time
last year and the question is because
we've seen this before is the job market
turning because every time when we see
claims turn a recession follows and
we're starting to see a lot of very
similar signs that we've seen back in
other recessions here's another sign
that we're seeing consumers right now
are both confident and broke now the
last time this happened guess what
we entered a recession now when we look
back in the past we can see when there
are good times and they last for a very
very long time which right now people
have been thinking and they don't
remember the past they only remember the
last couple of years that everything is
great in this economy because we've been
brainwashed to believe this over and
over the corporate media continually
tells us everything's great we're in a
recovery this is what a recovery looks
like this is what happens when there is
a recovery the stock market goes up and
people lose their jobs and what happens
is that people well they start behaving
in a way where they don't really care
that much anymore they stop saving they
spend a little bit more and for those
people who have lost their jobs this
doesn't happen at all and they become
confident but they have no money we're
starting to see this right now it's the
same thing that is happening and when we
look at this we can see that this
happened prior to 2001 it happened prior
to 2008 and we are seeing this happen
once again and this time it is worse
than it was in 2006 and as nearly as bad
as in 1999 so this is the second sign
right now that we are headed for some
trouble now if we go back to all the
other reports we can see that there are
other signs where the federal government
is not receiving the same tax receipts
of A's as they once received because a
lot more people have part-time jobs a
lot of people have been losing their
jobs and of course the unemployment
numbers have been manipulated and this
shows up in the tax receipts the
corporate tax receipts revenue coming in
to corporations not happening we're
seeing many other indicators showing us
that we are already in a recession we
see retail imploding housing declining
the GDP numbers how could they be real
if 70% is made up of people purchasing
things and retail is dying it makes no
sense we see manufacturing is declining
the Philly Fed right now
well it looks like it is declining now
of course the hope gauge is saying that
God we hope things get better the
outlook in six months looks great but
the real hard data it is declining the
Fed is out there telling us now there's
no inflation whatsoever there's you
don't have to worry about that we got it
covered it's very very low we're trying
to bring it up but this is a lie there
is a huge amount of inflation and if you
look over the past couple of years you
can see how food prices have gone up
college tuition has gone up housing
prices have gone up automobiles have
gone up if you look you can actually see
it a lot of this inflation has been put
into the stock market and many other
areas and what we're seeing right now is
that inflation is clocking in well above
its 2% target indeed the New York Fed
the uig inflation measure well it's
showing that we're around 3% and we know
it's much much higher than that that's
conservative right now and the reason
why we know that inflation is much
higher because we can see other central
banks in different countries where
they're hoarding gold where they're
purchasing a lot of gold Russia China
India many other countries they're doing
Germany they are buying gold because
they know the inflation rate right now
is much higher than is being reported
and they're taking advantage of this
very low goal price and this is what
they're doing right now and we can see
right now that the New York Fed well it
looks like there's other things going on
beneath the surface where they're trying
to convince everyone that yet
inflation's up a little bit but not much
but we could see that it's much higher
than it really is right now we also see
these three ominous signals which appear
right before a financial crisis a
recession
now we have not seen a leadership
reversal a Hindenburg omen and a Titanic
syndrome signal appear simultaneously
since just before the last financial
crisis john Hussman
pointed out that we've not seen this
sort of threefold sell signal since just
before the last financial crisis and he
went on to say that since 2007 we've
never seen this before I mean it
happened before 1999 we happened right
before 2008 and now we're seeing it
again the hindenburg omen this is a sell
signal that occurs when the new york
stock exchange hits new highs and new
lows
each exceed 2.8 percent of events plus
declines on the same day on Tuesday they
totaled more than 3% that the Titanic
syndrome is a sell signal triggered
while triggered when the new york stock
exchange 52 we close out numbered
52-week highs within seven days of an
all-time high in equities stocks most
recently hit a record on November 8th
and we had a change in leadership we
also see the flattening of the yoke
curve and this is another signal that we
are heading towards a recession now I
believe the recession already started in
2016 now again what happens is that when
we enter a recession or depression
months later the Fed the US government
they go back in time and they say oh
yeah by the way it started in 2016 but
they don't tell you this at the time
it's actually happening actually what
they're doing is they're covering it up
completely and if the yield curve
inverts well we are in a huge amount of

lot of signals letting us know that
something is coming down the road here
and we've been tracking a lot of this
information this is not just made up
not something that we haven't seen
before we've seen all of these things
happen before it is a pattern now I know
the Fed they can manipulate the US
government can manipulate the statistics
they can make us believe that everything

believe it everything's contained don't
you believe it
what happens when people stop believing
this is what we're going to see happen
once we go through this holiday season
and retail is a complete and utter
disaster
people are going to start scratching

here they're telling us we're at full
employment
I mean we're 4.1 percent here they're
telling us that everything is great that
everything is moving on to online why
are all these individuals out of work
why isn't online growing like they said
it is why are the restaurants closing
down why isn't their traffic why aren't
houses selling this makes no sense
whatsoever why the prices falling if
everything is fantastic if all of this

how are the GDP numbers above 2% it
makes no sense why are the initial

the tax receipts coming into the

we know the central banks have been

we know that the stimulus rotates

then the Fed does it the Bank of Japan

we know once we get word that we are in

and things all of a start and start to

then people once this happens the people

and you know what happens when things

everyone thanks a lot for listening be
well be safe and especially be prepared
thanks a lot
